fields.name: AdvancedSettings
fields.description: Settings for advanced scenarios.

fields.name: AmsGradient
fields.description: Enable AMSGrad when optimizer is 'adam' or 'adamw'.

fields.name: Augmentations
fields.description: Settings for using Augmentations.

fields.name: Beta1
fields.description: Value of 'beta1' when optimizer is 'adam' or 'adamw'. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

fields.name: Beta2
fields.description: Value of 'beta2' when optimizer is 'adam' or 'adamw'. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

fields.name: CheckpointFrequency
fields.description: Frequency to store model checkpoints. Must be a positive integer.

fields.name: CheckpointModel
fields.description: The pretrained checkpoint model for incremental training.

fields.name: CheckpointRunId
fields.description: The id of a previous run that has a pretrained checkpoint for incremental training.

fields.name: Distributed
fields.description: Whether to use distributed training.

fields.name: EarlyStopping
fields.description: Enable early stopping logic during training.

fields.name: EarlyStoppingDelay
fields.description:
Minimum number of epochs or validation evaluations to wait before primary metric improvement
is tracked for early stopping. Must be a positive integer.

fields.name: EarlyStoppingPatience
fields.description:
Minimum number of epochs or validation evaluations with no primary metric improvement before
the run is stopped. Must be a positive integer.

fields.name: EnableOnnxNormalization
fields.description: Enable normalization when exporting ONNX model.

fields.name: EvaluationFrequency
fields.description: Frequency to evaluate validation dataset to get metric scores. Must be a positive integer.

fields.name: GradientAccumulationStep
fields.description:
Gradient accumulation means running a configured number of "GradAccumulationStep" steps without
updating the model weights while accumulating the gradients of those steps, and then using
the accumulated gradients to compute the weight updates. Must be a positive integer.

fields.name: LayersToFreeze
fields.description:
Number of layers to freeze for the model. Must be a positive integer.
For instance, passing 2 as value for 'seresnext' means
freezing layer0 and layer1. For a full list of models supported and details on layer freeze, please
see: https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/how-to-auto-train-image-models.

fields.name: LearningRate
fields.description: Initial learning rate. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

fields.name: LearningRateScheduler
fields.description: Type of learning rate scheduler. Must be 'warmup_cosine' or 'step'.

fields.name: ModelName
fields.description:
Name of the model to use for training.
For more information on the available models please visit the official documentation:
https://docs.microsoft.com/en-us/azure/machine-learning/how-to-auto-train-image-models.

fields.name: Momentum
fields.description: Value of momentum when optimizer is 'sgd'. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

fields.name: Nesterov
fields.description: Enable nesterov when optimizer is 'sgd'.

fields.name: NumberOfEpochs
fields.description: Number of training epochs. Must be a positive integer.

fields.name: NumberOfWorkers
fields.description: Number of data loader workers. Must be a non-negative integer.

fields.name: Optimizer
fields.description: Type of optimizer.

fields.name: RandomSeed
fields.description: Random seed to be used when using deterministic training.

fields.name: StepLRGamma
fields.description: Value of gamma when learning rate scheduler is 'step'. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

fields.name: StepLRStepSize
fields.description: Value of step size when learning rate scheduler is 'step'. Must be a positive integer.

fields.name: TrainingBatchSize
fields.description: Training batch size. Must be a positive integer.

fields.name: TrainingCropSize
fields.description: Image crop size that is input to the neural network for the training dataset. Must be a positive integer.

fields.name: ValidationBatchSize
fields.description: Validation batch size. Must be a positive integer.

fields.name: ValidationCropSize
fields.description: Image crop size that is input to the neural network for the validation dataset. Must be a positive integer.

fields.name: ValidationResizeSize
fields.description: Image size to which to resize before cropping for validation dataset. Must be a positive integer.

fields.name: WarmupCosineLRCycles
fields.description: Value of cosine cycle when learning rate scheduler is 'warmup_cosine'. Must be a float in the range [0, 1].

fields.name: WarmupCosineLRWarmupEpochs
fields.description: Value of warmup epochs when learning rate scheduler is 'warmup_cosine'. Must be a positive integer.

fields.name: WeightDecay
fields.description: Value of weight decay when optimizer is 'sgd', 'adam', or 'adamw'. Must be a float in the range[0, 1].

fields.name: WeightedLoss
fields.description:
Weighted loss. The accepted values are 0 for no weighted loss.
1 for weighted loss with sqrt.(class_weights). 2 for weighted loss with class_weights. Must be 0 or 1 or 2.
